instrument_ticker.description: Instrument of the ticker feed snapshot

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp of the ticker feed snapshot

amount_step.title: amount_step
amount_step.description: Minimum valid increment of order amount

base_asset_address.title: base_asset_address
base_asset_address.description: Blockchain address of the base asset

base_asset_sub_id.title: base_asset_sub_id
base_asset_sub_id.description: Sub ID of the specific base asset as defined in Asset.sol

base_currency.title: base_currency
base_currency.description: Underlying currency of base asset (`ETH`, `BTC`, etc)

base_fee.title: base_fee
base_fee.description: $ base fee added to every taker order

best_ask_amount.title: best_ask_amount
best_ask_amount.description: Amount of contracts / tokens available at best ask price

best_bid_amount.title: best_bid_amount
best_bid_amount.description: Amount of contracts / tokens available at best bid price

oneOf.description: Details of the erc20 asset (if applicable)

erc20_details.description: Details of the erc20 asset (if applicable)

fifo_min_allocation.title: fifo_min_allocation
fifo_min_allocation.description: Minimum number of contracts that get filled using FIFO. Actual number of contracts that gets filled by FIFO will be the max between this value and (1 - pro_rata_fraction) x order_amount, plus any size leftovers due to rounding.

five_percent_ask_depth.title: five_percent_ask_depth
five_percent_ask_depth.description: Total amount of contracts / tokens available at 5 percent above best ask price

five_percent_bid_depth.title: five_percent_bid_depth
five_percent_bid_depth.description: Total amount of contracts / tokens available at 5 percent below best bid price

is_active.title: is_active
is_active.description: If `True`: instrument is tradeable within `activation` and `deactivation` timestamps

maker_fee_rate.title: maker_fee_rate
maker_fee_rate.description: Percent of spot price fee rate for makers

mark_price_fee_rate_cap.title: mark_price_fee_rate_cap
mark_price_fee_rate_cap.description: Percent of option price fee cap, e.g. 12.5%, null if not applicable

max_price.title: max_price
max_price.description: Maximum price at which an agressive buyer can be matched. Any portion of a market order that would execute above this price will be cancelled. A limit buy order with limit price above this value is treated as post only (i.e. it will be rejected if it would cross any existing resting order).

maximum_amount.title: maximum_amount
maximum_amount.description: Maximum valid amount of contracts / tokens per trade

min_price.title: min_price
min_price.description: Minimum price at which an agressive seller can be matched. Any portion of a market order that would execute below this price will be cancelled. A limit sell order with limit price below this value is treated as post only (i.e. it will be rejected if it would cross any existing resting order).

minimum_amount.title: minimum_amount
minimum_amount.description: Minimum valid amount of contracts / tokens per trade

open_interest.title: open_interest
open_interest.description: Margin type of subaccount (`PM` (Portfolio Margin), `PM2` (Portfolio Margin 2), or `SM` (Standard Margin)) -> (current open interest, open interest cap, manager currency)

oneOf.description: Details of the option asset (if applicable)

option_details.description: Details of the option asset (if applicable)

oneOf.description: Greeks, forward price, iv and mark price of the instrument (options only)

option_pricing.description: Greeks, forward price, iv and mark price of the instrument (options only)

oneOf.description: Details of the perp asset (if applicable)

perp_details.description: Details of the perp asset (if applicable)

pro_rata_amount_step.title: pro_rata_amount_step
pro_rata_amount_step.description: Pro-rata fill share of every order is rounded down to be a multiple of this number. Leftovers of the order due to rounding are filled FIFO.

pro_rata_fraction.title: pro_rata_fraction
pro_rata_fraction.description: Fraction of order that gets filled using pro-rata matching. If zero, the matching is full FIFO.

quote_currency.title: quote_currency
quote_currency.description: Quote currency (`USD` for perps, `USDC` for options)

scheduled_activation.title: scheduled_activation
scheduled_activation.description: Timestamp at which became or will become active (if applicable)

scheduled_deactivation.title: scheduled_deactivation
scheduled_deactivation.description: Scheduled deactivation time for instrument (if applicable)

stats.description: Aggregate trading stats for the last 24 hours

taker_fee_rate.title: taker_fee_rate
taker_fee_rate.description: Percent of spot price fee rate for takers

tick_size.title: tick_size
tick_size.description: Tick size of the instrument, i.e. minimum price increment

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp of the ticker feed snapshot

borrow_index.title: borrow_index
borrow_index.description: Latest borrow index as per `CashAsset.sol` implementation

decimals.title: decimals
decimals.description: Number of decimals of the underlying on-chain ERC20 token

supply_index.title: supply_index
supply_index.description: Latest supply index as per `CashAsset.sol` implementation

underlying_erc20_address.title: underlying_erc20_address
underlying_erc20_address.description: Address of underlying on-chain ERC20 (not V2 asset)

current_open_interest.title: current_open_interest
current_open_interest.description: Current open interest for the margin type

manager_currency.title: manager_currency
manager_currency.description: Currency of the manager (only applies to Portfolio Margin)

expiry.title: expiry
expiry.description: Unix timestamp of expiry date (in seconds)

ask_iv.title: ask_iv
ask_iv.description: Implied volatility of the current best ask

bid_iv.title: bid_iv
bid_iv.description: Implied volatility of the current best bid

discount_factor.title: discount_factor
discount_factor.description: Discount factor used to calculate option premium

forward_price.title: forward_price
forward_price.description: Forward price used to calculate option premium

funding_rate.title: funding_rate
funding_rate.description: Current hourly funding rate as per `PerpAsset.sol`

index.title: index
index.description: Underlying spot price index for funding rate

max_rate_per_hour.title: max_rate_per_hour
max_rate_per_hour.description: Max rate per hour as per `PerpAsset.sol`

min_rate_per_hour.title: min_rate_per_hour
min_rate_per_hour.description: Min rate per hour as per `PerpAsset.sol`

contract_volume.title: contract_volume
contract_volume.description: Number of contracts traded during last 24 hours

percent_change.title: percent_change
percent_change.description: 24-hour price change expressed as a percentage. Options: percent change in vol; Perps: percent change in mark price

title: ticker.{instrument_name}.{interval}
description: Periodically publishes ticker info (best bid / ask, instrument contraints, fees, etc.) for a single instrument.
